errorMessage.packet.been.sent.out:
Sorry,
 all bags have been sent out!
treasure.directSubBetRequirement: {{value}}% bet amount in Crypto games from level 1 friends。
referAndEarn.description: Invite friends to bring you Continuous Commission!
referAndEarn.description2: Get commission on the bets from all your team member who are lv 1 to lv 2.
referAndEarn.description3: Bet amount are defined as valid bets in crypto games (Mines, Crash).Valid bets will only be calculated for bets that have been settled and produced a win or loss result. Any games played, tied, or canceled will not be counted in valid bets.
rule.referralTeam.description: Only when your friends registered and owned over {{value}} KOKON in their wallet are counted valid member. Your team members can create a lv 1 to lv 2 Referral Team for you. The more members they bring in your team, the greater your income will be.
teamRatingSystem.description: There are five rating levels from 1 star to 5 star. Every referral team starts from 1 rating star, and you can upgrade your team rating through completing assignments. The higher rating your team is, the more rewards your team get.
eggRule.title: Rules of Smash Egg
eggRule.heading: Welcome to Smash Egg. Consume the hammer to get the big prize. Depending on the type of egg, the rewards and the required hammer for each smash are different:
eggRule.hint: You can get {{amount}} USDT after egg is broken.
eggRule.noticeContens: You have to smash the egg continuously until the egg is broken. If you give up halfway, the consumed hammer will not be returned.
eggGiveUp.desc1: If you give up smashing the egg, the hammer you have consumed will not be returned.
eggGiveUp.desc2: Are you sure you want to give up?
CurrencyConversion.Description: Your KOKON coins will be converted to USDT for gaming.
rank.rules.crypto.title: Crypto Rank Rule
rank.rules.crypto.content1.subTitle: Valid bet
rank.rules.crypto.content1.content: The ranking is based on how much you bet in crypto games (Mines, Crash). Valid bets will only be calculated for bets that have been settled and produced a win or loss result. Any games played, tied, or canceled will not be counted in valid bets.
rank.rules.crypto.content2.subTitle: Update time
rank.rules.crypto.content2.content: Ranking list is updated once an hour.
rank.rules.crypto.content3.subTitle: End time
rank.rules.crypto.content4.subTitle: Daily
rank.rules.crypto.content5.subTitle: Weekly
rank.rules.crypto.content6.subTitle: Monthly
rank.rules.crypto.content7.subTitle: Ranking rewards
rank.rules.crypto.content7.content: Rewards will be distributed automatically in 2 hour after the final result of ranking come out.
rank.rules.share.title: Share Rank Rule
rank.rules.share.content1.subTitle: Valid friends
rank.rules.share.content1.content: Share Rank is a competition for who can invite more friends to join KOKON. The ranking is according how many friends you invite become valid members. Once your friends have more than 100 KOKON in their wallet, they are the valid friend.
rank.rules.share.content2.subTitle: Update time
rank.rules.share.content2.content: Ranking list is updated once an hour.
rank.rules.share.content3.subTitle: End time
rank.rules.share.content4.subTitle: Daily
rank.rules.share.content5.subTitle: Ranking rewards
rank.rules.share.content5.content: Rewards will be distributed automatically in 2 hour after the final result of ranking come out.
Name: Name
JoinMyTeamToPlayTheGameAndEarnKOKONCoin: Join my team to play the game and earn KOKON coin.
TeamStarRating.Description: The star rating will be upgraded based on betting amount of your team. Higher star rating lead to higher commission percentages.
TotalBets.Description: Bet amount are defined as valid bets in crypto games (Mines, Crash).Valid bets will only be calculated for bets that have been settled and produced a win or loss result. Any games played, tied, or canceled will not be counted in valid bets.
CommissionDetails.Description: Only the past 30 days are displayed. Commissions are automatically credited to your wallet every hour.
AllMembers.Description: Only when your friends registered and owned over {{value}} KOKON in their wallet are counted valid member.
InputSameEmailError: Please don’t enter the same email as current email
InputPasswordConfirmNoMatchError: The password confirmation does not match
